thread.title: Former Best and Less boss Holly Kramer joins AMP board
thread.title_full: Former Best and Less boss Holly Kramer joins AMP board

author: The Sydney Morning Herald
title: Former Best and Less boss Holly Kramer joins AMP board
text:
Former Best & Less chief Holly Kramer joins AMP board. Photo: Fiona Morris
The former head of discount retailer Best & Less, Holly Kramer, is joining the board of financial services giant AMP.
Ms Kramer, who has also held senior roles with Telstra and Pacific Brands, will take up her new position on October 14.
AMP chairman Simon McKeon said Ms Kramer's extensive experience in leading customer-focused organisations made her a valuable addition to AMP's board.
